charges.charge_description: PRODUCES/TRAFFICS IN COUNTERFEIT DEVICE (ACCESS DEVICE FRAUD CONSPIRACY)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a total term of 15 Months as to Count One and 24 Months as to Count Three, to run consecutively, for a total of 39 Months. Supervised release for a term of 3 Years as to Count One and 1 year as to Count Three, to run concurrently, for a 3 years.

charges.charge_description: 18:1028A.F FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS (AGGRAVATED IDENTITY THEFT)(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a total term of 15 Months as to Count One and 24 Months as to Count Three, to run consecutively, for a total of 39 Months. Supervised release for a term of 3 Years as to Count One and 1 year as to Count Three, to run concurrently, for a 3 years.

charges.charge_description: PRODUCES/TRAFFICS IN COUNTERFEIT DEVICE (ACCESS DEVICE FRAUD )(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Any pending counts are dismissed on the motion of the US
